## MapView.forEachCachedTile() method

Apply a visitor function to all tiles in the cache.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forEachCachedTile(visitor: (tile: Tile) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  visitor | (tile: [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Visitor function |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
